trans-unit.target: Visit Fribourg with the FriPass
This pass offers you unlimited and free travel by public transport and free visits of 30 tourist attractions in the entire Fribourg region for a very nice price !
What are your advantages ?
Activities, museums and transports in an unique pass for a very nice price: essential for your stay in Fribourg! Look at all the advantages of the FriPass
Activities, Museums, Leisure activities Fribourg
Here are some of the activities to visit : Maison Cailler, Papiliorama, the Fribourg museums, the castle and les Bains de la Gruyère, the summit of Moléson, etc.
Itinerary and walking trails ideas !
Discover our itinerary and walking trails ideas with the FriPass and share an unforgeatable day with friends or family in Fribourg region.
Order online !
Order the FriPass in a few minutes on the website and enjoy a lot of advantages : activities and transports in the whole Fribourg region with a unique pass
General terms of use of your pass
Check the general terms of sale and use of your FriPass : rates, conditions, cancellations, refunds, etc…
Privacy statement
Check the privacy statement of the FriPass.
Where can you buy your pass ?
Online or beside one of our partners, check the points of sale of the FriPass in Fribourg region
